name: Kabutops
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: It is thought that this Pokémon came onto land because its prey adapted to life on land.

poke_body.name: Primal Shell
poke_body.effect: As long as Kabutops is your Active Pokémon, your opponent can’t play any Trainer cards from his or her hand.

attacks.name: Chop Up
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
